skillTree.localised_description: Tunnel bosses are Greenskins who are good at shoutin’ and hollerin’ at mobs when underground, where space and sight is an issue.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 during subterranean siege battles
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean intercept battles
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A Bellower’s voice is as deep as it loud, carrying across the battlefield, making sure the boyz are focused on the carnage.
You can’t trust ‘im. E’s a little bit woaah, a little bit Waaagh! Ya know? Well dodgy.
Ten Goblins? Inconvenient.\\nA hundred? Alarming.\\nA thousand? \\nUh oh!

effects.description:
Melee attack: +6 for Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: Grom is titanic – a bloated Goblin of such great immensity that every other gobbo looks up to him, both figuratively and literally!
Every settlement keeps the fires stoked and the meat burning in case Grom decides to show up for an impromptu snack.
Grom's ridiculous girth provides some measure of protection against the weapons of his puny foes.
"Paint it red! More spikes! Bigga wheelz! STIKK SOME BOMBZ ON THE BACK!"

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Chariots and Pump Wagon units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Chariot and Pump Wagon units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Armour: +20 for Chariots and Pump Wagon units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +20% for Chariot and Pump Wagon units
	(Lord's army)

Attribute: Perfect Vigour for Chariots and Pump Wagon units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Grom's appetite cannot be contained merely to the culinary realm…
"We're gonna dis-kum-bob-url-rate em good!"\\n"Izzat even a word?"\\n"Dunno."

effects.description: Attacks cause "Rattled" effect, reducing combat ability

skillTree.localised_description: Those of great stature often overlook the humble Goblin. Goblins, however, are almost preternaturally aware of nearby shins in need of a good stabbin'!

effects.description:
Bonus vs Large: +5 for Goblin units

Melee attack: +5 for Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +10 for Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Like any good Warboss, Grom understands well the art of getting back up after every setback.

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -5 for Elven units
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy leadership: -10 for Elven units
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Orc choppas are crude and hefty blades usually swung with violent joy by their owner. A choppa in full swing can have a brutal, crunching impact on the poor fool on the receiving end.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
“Forget about da little stuff… we’s gonna get da biggest haul da tribes ever seen!”
“Get movin’ you gits! Da WAAAGH is ‘ere!

These gobbos have an air of superiority about them, using their rudimentary understanding of physics and engineering to expedite the tribe’s technological superiority. They’re very persnickety about getting their building projects just right though..

effects.description:
Construction time: +20% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: “A bit o’ dis, a bit o’ dat, grab any o’ da metal fings and slap ‘em on.”
‘Anyone who finks otherwise can zog right off.’

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: +10% for all units

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
A wise Boss knows how to lure the enemy into places where they can be ambushed or trapped with mobs that skulk in the tunnels below.

effects.description: Evasion chance when using the Underway: +6%
Evasion chance when using the Underway: +16%
Evasion chance when using the Underway: +30%

skillTree.localised_description: Raiders are good at marauding through enemy settlements - sending their denizens fleeing as their properties are despoiled.
Those that excel as looters make sure that every coin or gold tooth is found and added to the plunder. Woe betide the warrior that misses even a single copper token!
Ravagers are merciless - they will sack an enemy settlement, take everything and kill any that get in their way.
These iron-hard gits are particularly tough and gnarly Greenskins, who - even if wounded - will be up and ready to fight before too long.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: Occasionally an Orc will come along who is more "kunning" than the rest. He quickly rises in ranks as his plans end in victory.
A Boss that has the loyalty of the mobs means he doesn’t have to worry so much about "da boring stuff" like tents and bedding, as they’ll fight for him no matter what.
Being green meanz ya really mean.
This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

factionEffects.localised_description: "Them Elves ain't that scary, deyz just stunties who'z a bit taller."

effects.description: Grom cooks dishes for various units and faction bonuses
Waaagh! has a chance to contain Pump Wagons
Global recruitment duration: -1 turn for Goblin units
Recruit rank: +2 for Chariots and Pump Wagon units

items.colour_text: Along with his serendipitous standard-bearer, Niblet, who once somehow survived being sat on by him, the Goblin King’s banner brings inexplicable luck.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +25%

items.colour_text: Like a butcher’s cleaver, Grom uses the fabled ‘Elf-Biter’ to make tasty cuts of meat out of his rivals!

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Maintaining a chariot that can support Grom's immense weight pushes Goblin engineering skills to their limits.
